channel.title: Adding an Item to Item.cfg
channel.description:
How do I add an item to item.cfg?
something like this?
item = *id* *description* *??* *??* and the rest ??
What are those ones?

item.title: Adding an Item to Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

item = 35 Excalibur This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur. 160.036754819048 160.036754819048 181.443095635579 20 29 -2 0 0 0 3 2 1

Item ID, Item Name, Examine Info, High alchemy price, shop price, low alchemy price, attack (stab bonus), attack (slash bonus), attack (crush bonus), attack (range bonus), attack (magic bonus), defence (stab bonus), defence (slash bonus), defence (crush bonus), defence (range bonus), defence (magic bonus), strength bonus, prayer bonus.

Read full topic
